attributes.action: Objection of the erection of 223 houses In Walmer Kent CT14 7RH
attributes.additional_details:
This petition is for Residents and visitors of Walmer, Deal Kent to have the opportunity to object to the proposed erection of of 223 dwellings (including 66 affordable units) together with associated vehicular access, car parking, landscaping and open space(amended plans) | Land off, Station Road, Walmer, CT14 7RH. As a community we feel Walmer and Deal's infrastructure is unable to cope with this development.
- Medical  and Emergency Service
- Road Conjestion surrounding the development site
- Local residents view of countryside
- Local care establishments
- Schools
- Parking in local town
- Pollution
- Nature living in the countryside that will be destroyed...
- list non-exhaustive
